full_description:
Walton UNIFY S24 WAOS24121M 23.8" Core i3 12th Gen FHD IPS All in One Desktop PC

The Walton UNIFY S24 WAOS24121M 23.8" Core i3 12th Gen FHD IPS All-in-One Desktop PC is a source of productivity and innovation. At its core is the Intel Core i3 12100 CPU, which has a massive 12M cache and a basic clock speed of 3.30GHz, which can be dynamically increased to 4.30GHz when needed. With 4 cores and 8 threads, this CPU provides seamless multitasking and responsiveness, allowing you to do any activity with ease. The fast processor is complemented by 8GB of DDR4 RAM, which provides enough capacity to run many apps concurrently without slowing down. This UNIFY S24 WAOS24121M desktop PC, equipped with a large 512GB SSD, provides lightning-fast boot speeds, quick program launches, and speedy data access, allowing you to spend less time waiting and more time being productive. The UNIFY S24 has a magnificent 23.8" FHD IPS display with a 1920x1080 resolution, which provides rich colors, clear details, and broad viewing angles for an immersive visual experience. Whether you're editing images, watching movies, or working on spreadsheets, everything appears great on this high-definition display. The UNIFY S24 comes with a built-in camera and speakers, as well as high-definition audio capabilities, ensuring smooth communication and multimedia experiences straight out of the box. From video conferencing to streaming your favorite music or movies, this all-in-one desktop PC offers outstanding sound and visuals for all your entertainment and productivity needs. The Walton UNIFY S24 is more than just a desktop PC; it's a comprehensive computing solution designed to improve your workflow and take your digital experiences to new heights.

full_description:
Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO Pentium Gold G6500 21.5" FHD All in One Desktop PC

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO All-in-One Desktop PC is a powerful and user-friendly desktop PC. It comes with Intel 10th Gen Pentium Gold G6500 (2 Core, 4 thread, Base Clock Speed 4.10 GHz, 4 MB Smart Cache) for smooth operation. The AIO PC has a 21.5" FHD display that provides immersive visuals, while the high-speed DDR4 memory and ample storage allow for smooth multitasking and speedy file access. The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO All in One Desktop PC features Intel UHD Graphics, high-definition audio, and a variety of networking choices.

Immersive 21.5" FHD Display

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO All in One Desktop PC comes with a 21.5" FHD display that delivers amazing visuals with a resolution of 1920x1080. The anti-glare display prevents reflections, while the 3000:1 contrast ratio and brightness of 250cd/m2 provide vivid and beautiful colors. With a 16:9 aspect ratio and 16.7 million color options, your content comes to life on this immersive display.

High-Speed DDR4 Memory and Ample Storage

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance with 8GB DDR4 2666Mhz RAM and compatibility for up to 32GB. The dual-channel DDR4 memory design speeds up data transfer. The PC includes a 1TB HDD for abundant storage and a 256GB M.2 SATA SSD, which can be upgraded up to 1TB, for speedy boot times and file access.

UHD Graphics and High-Definition Audio

The integrated Intel UHD Graphics 630 ensures smooth graphics performance for everyday tasks and light gaming. The UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO also comes with a high-definition audio system, powered by Realtek ALC662 6-Channel High Definition Audio CODEC. Enjoy immersive sound and built-in speakers for an enhanced multimedia experience.

Flexible Connectivity and Built-in Webcam

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO includes a 10/100/1000Mb Base-TX Ethernet LAN, Intel Wireless WiFi, and Bluetooth for smooth networking and wireless connectivity. The PC comes with a 2.0MP camera and dual microphones with a camera module, which enables simple video conferencing and online communication.

Convenient I/O Ports

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO comprises a wide range of I/O ports for flexible connectivity. Two USB 2.0 ports, a headphone jack, and a microphone jack are located on the side, while the back ports include audio jacks, an RJ-45 port, HDMI and D-Sub (VGA) connectors, USB 3.2 Gen 1x1 and USB 2.0 ports, and a DC-in connector.

Buy Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO Pentium Gold G6500 21.5" FHD All in One Desktop PC from Star Tech

The Walton UNIFY S22 WAO22G650PRO All in One Desktop PC comes with 3 years warranty.
